column2: TITLE:-  Manager  Placements Open requirements :- 8 Locations:-  Kolkata (WB), Bengaluru (KA), Hyderabad (Telangana),  Chennai (TN), Vizag/Vishakhapatnam (AP), Ahmedabad/Surat (GJ)  Delhi/NCR, Kanpur(UP)   ROLE:   The Placement Manager will   be responsible for the efficient setup and management of placement operations   for Edunet Foundation and its group entities, with a primary focus on   achieving 100% placement of eligible program participants.     RESPONSIBILITIES Develop and maintain strong relationships with   industry partners, including corporations, companies, and organizations   across various sectors. Identify internship and job placement opportunities   suitable for  our students   (Higher Education Engineering, Btech (IT & CS) & ITI students)  based on their skills, interests, and career goals. Collaborate with academic departments/TPO to   understand student profiles and requirements, and tailor placement strategies   accordingly. Organize and coordinate campus recruitment drives,   job fairs, and networking events to connect students with potential   employers. Provide guidance and support to students throughout   the placement process, including resume writing, interview preparation, and   negotiation skills. Track and monitor placement activities, maintain   accurate records, and generate reports to assess placement progress and   outcomes. Stay updated on industry trends, job market   demands, and relevant regulations to ensure effective placement strategies. Willingness to travel extensively within the country.   LOCATION & TRAVEL The   organization permits work from home with only visits to office and/or other   stakeholders, as required for meetings. The candidate should ideally be based in Kolkata (WB), Bengaluru (KA), Hyderabad (Telangana),  Chennai (TN), Vizag/Vishakhapatnam (AP), Ahmedabad/Surat (GJ)  Delhi/NCR, but we can look at candidates from other locations as well, who are ok to relocate to these regions.    EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS Minimum Bachelors degree in sciences or technology or   business from a reputed institution. A Masters degree in any discipline or an MBA will add   to the attractiveness of submitted profiles.  7-10 years of work experience of relevant experience   with handling placements on a large scale. Prior experience with placement operations in states   like AP, KA,WB, MH, GJ, UP & Delhi/NCR will be an added advantage.  Track record of exceeding goals   SKILLS & ATTRIBUTES Excellent communication skills (English and Hindi  minimum, Telugu/Gujarati/Marathi additional, preferred) Outcome focused Interpersonal skills Team management Attention to detail Working in cross-functional teams.  Time management Working within budgets Highly ethical with unimpeachable integrity
column11: Corporate Relations, Placement, Engineering Students, Corporate Tie-ups, Skill Development, Employment opportunities

column2: We are looking for a committed Faculty to complement our qualified workforce of educators. You will be responsible for implementing a full educational teaching plan according to the institute s requirements. It will be fundamental to provide knowledge and instruction to students while also helping them develop their personalities and skills.      The ideal candidate will be passionate for the job with an ability to reach out to students and create a relationship of mutual trust. They will know how to organize a class and make learning an easy and meaningful process.      The goal is to help cultivate the students interest in education and be their dedicated ally in the entire process of learning and development.        Responsibilities:          Present lessons in a comprehensive manner and use visual / audio means to facilitate learning      Provide individualized instruction to each student by promoting interactive learning      Distribute educational content (notes, summaries, assignments )      Assess and record students progress and provide grades and feedback      Maintain a tidy and orderly classroom      Collaborate with other teachers, and stakeholders and participate in regular meetings      Observe and understand students behavior and psyche and report suspicions of neglect etc.      Develop and enrich professional skills and knowledge by continuous learning          Requirements:          Proven experience as a teacher      Thorough knowledge of teaching best practices      Excellent communicability and interpersonal skills      Well-organized and committed      Creative and energetic      Strong moral values and discipline
column11: Interpersonal skills, Research, Teaching

Min 5 years of experience as a principal, over all min 15 years of experience.        SKILL SET          Curriculum Development and Educational Leadership skills.      Excellent Communication and Middle School management skills.      Experience in Education and School Administration.      A deep understanding of child psychology and developmental stages of children.      Ability to motivate and lead a team of educators and staff members.      A master s degree in Education or School Administration.      Experience in developing and implementing policies and procedures for schools.      Excellent problem-solving, decision-making, and organizational skills.      Experience in working with diverse communities and multicultural environments

column2: Responsible for 100% placement target, Containers local for all over India. Minimum achievement of 93% is compulsory.      Receiving the Indent from the customers by Phone or By Mail.      Bargain with the brokers to get the best deal or margin. Supporting in making the advance payment up to 80% of the hire through RTGS or cheque only.      Placing the proper (Fit to load) vehicles according    to the Indents received    and collecting the documents like Broker slip, Pan Card, TDS form and other documents from the brokers. Broker slip needs to be verified and authorized with signature with date.      Updating daily vehicle hiring cost to management. (Implementation of the register with the hire charges for the important locations on daily basis)      Customer site visit to avoid losses and ensure safe to load formalities. Weekly at least one visits.      Visiting the brokers/vendors for finding out the genuinely and creating new vendors/brokers. Weekly at least two visits.      Coordinate with the loading staff and depute them to the places where the loading is to be taking place as per the indents.      Prepare daily booking report and forward to all concerned, thrice a day.      Preparing submitting the pending placement orders (Failures) through whatsup thrice, the last being end of the day.      Verification of the challan registers in all manner for weight, freight, detention, TDS, labor and other matters.      Negotiating with the Brokers/Vendors for disputed cases for:          Detention at Loading unloading point, as per the agreed terms.      Recovery of late delivery charges.      Coordinating with tracking team the brokers/owners for the vehicles running above the schedule (delay Vehicle).      Recovery of claim amount in case of damages/leakages/shortages or of any nature like damage to the customer property.      Collection of PODS invoices.          Taking the Full Placement responsibility for the customers like Gulf, PPL, etc.      Arranging the market loads for Company owned vehicles.

column2: You will be responsible for connecting qualified candidates with employment opportunities     This role involves establishing relationships with employers, coordinating job placement activities, and providing support to candidates throughout the hiring process         Key Responsibilities:         Employer Relationship Building:Develop and maintain strong relationships with employers to understand their hiring needs     Collaborate with companies to create placement opportunities for candidates     Candidate Placement:Identify suitable job opportunities for candidates based on their skills, qualifications, and career goals     Coordinate and facilitate the placement process, from application submission to job offer acceptance     Job Matching:Assess candidate profiles and match them with relevant job openings     Provide guidance to candidates on resume building and interview preparation     Networking:Attend industry events, job fairs, and networking functions to expand connections with potential employers     Stay informed about industry trends and job market dynamics     Job Postings and Advertising:Post job openings on various platforms, including job portals, social media, and the company's website     Develop and implement effective advertising strategies to attract employers and candidates     Documentation:Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of candidate profiles, job placements, and employer interactions     Prepare reports on placement activities and outcomes     Candidate Support:Provide guidance and support to candidates throughout the job search and placement process     Offer advice on career development, skill enhancement, and professional growth     Feedback Collection:Gather feedback from employers regarding candidate performance and placement satisfaction     Use feedback to enhance the quality of placements and relationships with employers

column1: Faculty F&B Service, Training & Placement Coordinator
column2: The Faculty FB Service, Training Placement Coordinator is responsible for providing quality education and training to students in the field of Food and Beverage Service      This role also involves coordinating training programs and internships for students, as well as liaising with industry partners to facilitate placements and internships      The coordinator plays a vital role in shaping the future of students by imparting industry-relevant skills and ensuring successful placement opportunities      Key Responsibilities:Teaching and Training:Conduct classroom lectures, practical sessions, and workshops related to Food and Beverage Service      Design and develop course materials, lesson plans, and assessments to ensure effective learning outcomes      Provide hands-on training to students in various aspects of FB service, including table setup, service techniques, menu knowledge, and customer interaction      Training Program Coordination:Coordinate training programs, workshops, and guest lectures conducted by industry professionals      Collaborate with culinary and hospitality faculty to create interdisciplinary training initiatives      Monitor and assess student progress during training programs and provide feedback for improvement      Placement and Internship Coordination:Develop and maintain relationships with hotels, restaurants, and hospitality establishments to facilitate student internships and placements      Assist students in preparing resumes, conducting mock interviews, and enhancing their employability skills      Coordinate placement drives and campus interviews, ensuring a smooth recruitment process for both students and recruiters      Industry Engagement:Organize industry visits, seminars, and networking events to expose students to real-world FB service environments      Collaborate with industry partners to stay updated on the latest trends, techniques, and technologies in the FB service sector      Act as a bridge between the institute and the industry, fostering meaningful partnerships and collaborations      Student Mentoring:Provide academic and career guidance to students, addressing their concerns and assisting them in making informed decisions      Mentor students on professionalism, workplace ethics, and industry expectations      Encourage and support students in participating in competitions, events, and extracurricular activities related to FB service      Administrative Tasks:Maintain accurate records of student attendance, performance, and placement status      Prepare reports on placement activities, student achievements, and industry collaborations for management review      Assist in organizing internal examinations, assessments, and evaluations      Qualifications:Bachelors or Masters degree in Hospitality Management, Hotel Management, or a related field      Relevant certifications in Food and Beverage Service and Teaching/Training methodologies are desirable      Prior teaching/training experience in the field of Food and Beverage Service      Strong communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills      Knowledge of industry trends, standards, and best practices in FB service      Proficiency in using educational technology and learning management systems
column11: Training, HR Faculty, Hotel management, Placement Coordinator

column2: The Placement Associate plays a pivotal role in the success of our company by assisting students in finding suitable employment opportunities and internships. They will work closely with students, faculties, and employers to bridge the gap between education and industry, enabling students to make a successful transition into the workforce. Role & responsibilities Student Engagement: Foster strong relationships with students and provide career counselling and guidance to help them identify their career goals. Conduct one-on-one sessions and workshops to assist students with resume building, interview preparation, and job search strategies. Conduct initial interviews or assessments to evaluate candidates, skills, experience, and qualifications.  Assess candidate's suitability for specific job roles based on their abilities and personality traits. Employer Relationship Management: Develop and maintain relationships with potential employers, MNC companies, and industry partners to create job and internship opportunities. Promote the company's reputation within the industry to attract more employers. Travel as per organization requirement. Schedule and coordinate interviews between candidates and hiring managers. Provide candidates with necessary information about interview logistics, such as time, location, and format. Job and Internship Placement: Match students with appropriate job openings and internships in line with their career aspirations and educational background. Assist students in preparing and submitting job applications and provide support during the recruitment process, meeting the placement targets set by Management. Data Management and Reporting: Maintain accurate records of student placement data, including job offers and internship placements along with other reports in CRM. Generate regular reports for the management team, highlighting placement trends and outcomes. Follow SOP and guidelines of the organization. Career Workshops and Events: Plan, organize, and conduct career development workshops, job fairs, and networking events to enhance student's job search skills. Collaborate with instructors to integrate career-related content into the curriculum. Follow-up and Alumni Support: Maintain contact with alumni to assess their career progress and provide assistance if needed. Collect feedback from both students and employers to continually improve placement services. Provide support to candidates throughout the onboarding process and initial period of employment. Preferred candidate profile   Any Graduate or postgraduate in business management/HR (BBA/MBA). Candidate must have 1-year experience in education sector.  Excellent computer skills, including a high degree of proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel, Outlook and PowerPoint. Must have proven experience as a target achieved. Communication Skills Negotiation Skills
column11: Education Industry, Interview Coordination, Campus Interviews, Communication Skills, Negotiation, Student Engagement, Personality Development, Skill Development, Interview Scheduling, Placement Coordination

column2: Candidate Placement:         Work closely with job seekers to understand their skills, qualifications, and career goals.     Identify suitable job opportunities based on candidate profiles and preferences.     Coordinate and facilitate the placement process from initial contact to successful placement.         Employer Engagement:         Build and maintain relationships with employers to understand their staffing needs.     Collaborate with hiring managers to match qualified candidates with available job openings.     Conduct employer outreach to expand the network of hiring partners.         Job Matching:         Review resumes, conduct interviews, and assess candidate qualifications to ensure a good fit for both the candidate and the employer.     Provide guidance to candidates on resume writing, interview preparation, and job search strategies.         Documentation and Reporting:         Maintain accurate records of candidate placements, including contact details, job specifications, and placement outcomes.     Generate regular reports on placement activities, success rates, and areas for improvement.         Career Counseling:         Offer career counseling and guidance to help candidates make informed decisions about their professional development.     Provide information on training programs, certifications, and skill development opportunities.         Networking:         Attend job fairs, networking events, and industry conferences to promote placement services.     Build partnerships with educational institutions, community organizations, and workforce development agencies.         Compliance:         Stay informed about employment laws, regulations, and industry standards.     Ensure compliance with all relevant employment and placement regulations.         Feedback and Improvement:         Gather feedback from both candidates and employers to continuously improve the placement process.     Implement improvements based on feedback and industry best practices.       Requirements:       Education:         Bachelors degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Counseling, or a related field.         Experience:         Proven experience in recruitment, placement, or related roles.     Familiarity with employment trends, market demands, and industry requirements.         Communication Skills:         Excellent verbal and written communication skills.     Ability to effectively communicate with diverse groups, including job seekers, employers, and internal teams.         Organizational Skills:         Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.     Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy in documentation.         Networking:         Proven ability to build and maintain professional relationships.     Experience in networking and engaging with employers and community partners.         Problem-Solving:         Ability to assess candidate and employer needs and find creative solutions.     Strong problem-solving skills in addressing challenges related to placements.         Technology Proficiency:         Proficient in using recruitment software, databases, and other relevant tools.     Familiarity with social media platforms for professional networking.
